scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n TSC,VITE,ELECTRON "tsc -w -p tsconfig.electron.json" "vite --config vite.config.mjs" "wait-on tcp:5173 && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron ."
scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && npm run build:renderer && electron-builder --dir
scripts.dist: tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && npm run build:renderer && electron-builder -w -m
